overview: Arrieta Adams discovers that her stepmother Lauren Phillips is still a virgin. She wanted to keep her virginity for someone special like Arrieta's father, but when the wedding night came he was taken from them. Arietta feels for Lauren, insisting that Lauren has spent so much time caring for her that it's HER turn to return the favor. Katya Rodriguez wants to adopt a stray cat, which her stepmother Texas Patti categorically refuses. Katya tries to find a valid exchange that would allow her to adopt the cat. After some thought, Texas has an idea. If she wants to take care of a pussy, she has to take care of her pussy first. Haley Reed and her stepmother Serene Siren are waiting in doctor Serena Blair's office. As Serena asks her routine questions, she realizes that there is something between Haley and Serene. Not wanting this to dry up, Serene asks the doctor to keep this to herself. As for her, Serena wants to take the opportunity to include herself for a threesome.
title: Pussy For Pussy
